text: ۞ وَٱتۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ ٱبۡنَيۡ ءَادَمَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ إِذۡ قَرَّبَا قُرۡبَانٗا فَتُقُبِّلَ مِنۡ أَحَدِهِمَا وَلَمۡ يُتَقَبَّلۡ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓخَرِ قَالَ لَأَقۡتُلَنَّكَۖ قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَتَقَبَّلُ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
translation: 27.Nabiyow israa-iil xaylol Aadam Namma baxih (Qhaabiil kee Haabiil kinnuk) xaaguy cakki xaagu kinni akriyaay keenil maaqey ken Nammayak kulli num Yallat xayyoowuh maruw kaah xayyoyse num kee buqrek tawqeemik gactam kaah xayyoyse num yekken waqdi, tokkel Yalli keenik numuk teynay (Haabiil kinnuk) Yallak meesitak sugek oggoleeh, akattuy (Qhaabiil kinnuk) Yallak meesite waak sugek moggolinna, tokkel Qhaabiil isi toobokoytak diggah anu koo Qideyyo iyye, Haabiil kaal gacisak cagalah Yalli как oggolam isik meesita mara kaak iyye.
